item.title: Decompilers
item.description: Decompilers Decompilers list: Angr FoxDex Ghidra

item.title: TLSH
item.description: TLSH Trend Locality Sensitive Hash. Standard TLSH hash is 70 characters long. All 3-grams from a sliding window of 5 bytes are used to compute an array of bucket counts, which are used to form the digest body. Based on the calculation of bucket counts (as calculated above) the three quartiles are calculated (referred to as q1, q2, and q3 respectively). The digest body is constructed based on the values of the quartiles in the array of bucket counts, using two bits per 128 buckets to construct a 32 byte digest.
